column1: The CDC has some great advice for those considering travel in the US. Check it out at https:/â€¦travel-in-the-us.htmlHope we can all stay healthy.
I live in Eagle its true. More cases daily. We are being advised to minimize social contact to only essentials.
I'm in Avon and we could use a break. Community spread is real up here and we need to flatten the curve to lessen the stain.
